item.title: Kelly Rowland couldn't have used the =HYPERLINK() function to message Nelly
item.description: - In the Kelly Rowland/Nelly song "Dilemma," Kelly Rowland tries to send a message to Nelly using a Nokia 9210 Communicator.

item.title: Displayport: A Better Video Interface
item.description: - DisplayPort is a powerful video interface that offers improved capabilities compared to other interfaces like HDMI.

item.title: GPT-4 details leaked?
item.description: - The details about GPT-4 may have been leaked, but we cannot access the thread due to new Twitter API restrictions.

item.title: Linux has achieved a 3% desktop market share
item.description: - Linux has achieved a 3% market share in the desktop segment, according to StatCounter's data, marking a significant milestone in its popularity among regular computer users.

item.title: Newpipe.net removed from Google search results due to DMCA take down request
item.description: - The official website of NewPipe, a popular project, has been removed from Google search results due to a DMCA takedown notice filed by a French record label called "Because Music."

item.title: SUSE is forking RHEL
item.description: - SUSE, a global leader in enterprise open source solutions, has announced that it is forking Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and will develop and maintain a RHEL-compatible distribution available to all without restrictions.

item.title: Privatisation has been a costly failure in Britain
item.description: - The economic experiment of privatization in Britain has been considered a failure, particularly in the water industry.

item.title: Claude 2
item.description: - Claude 2 is a new and improved AI model that offers improved performance, longer responses, and can be accessed via API and a new beta website, claude.ai.

item.title: GPT-Prompt-Engineer
item.description: - The gpt-prompt-engineer is a tool that uses AI models to generate, test, and rank prompts for specific tasks based on user-defined use cases and test cases.

item.title: The Free Movie
item.description: - MSCHF has released a project called "The Free Movie" which is a hand-drawn, crowd-created recreation of the entire BEE Movie.
